benchmark_details.name: Interplay
benchmark_details.overview: Interplay is a novel dataset comprising thousands of interaction plans that cover long-horizon static and dynamic interaction tasks to evaluate human-object interaction synthesis.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enable systematic evaluation of a framework for synthesizing human-object interactions using Vision-Language Models.

data.source: Constructed dataset using high-quality 3D object assets from various existing datasets.
data.annotation: Automatically designed interactions without manual annotations.

methodology.calculation: Task-specific rewards and progress assessment based on actions executed by humanoid character.
methodology.interpretation: Metrics reflect the effectiveness of interaction planning and execution across human-object scenarios.
methodology.validation: Performance evaluated against several benchmarks through extensive experiments.
